sentences.sentence: He and Lieutenant Cassidy were checking the scene of the crime.
sentences.translation: 当时他正与卡西迪中尉一起检查犯罪现场。

sentences.sentence: The police are checking out his alibi.
sentences.translation: 警察在查证他不在案发现场的证据。

sentences.sentence: My parents are always checking up on me.
